means: 对某物、某人或某境况具有矛盾情感的

word_mean: 矛盾心理的，矛盾情绪的

sentence.Network_en: He maintained an ambivalent attitude to the Church throughout his long life.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他漫长的一生中，他对基督教信仰始终是一种摇摆不定的态度。

sentence.Network_en: She seems to feel ambivalent about her new job.
sentence.Network_cn: 她似乎对新工作忧喜参半。

sentence.Network_en: I must have acquired ambivalent attitude towards women from her.
sentence.Network_cn: 我对妇女的矛盾态度一定是从她那里学来的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 托福单词表 - 豆丁网 ... exalt 赞扬 ambivalent 矛盾的。 ambi= 相等.
GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... ambiguity n． 模棱两可 ambivalent adj． （对人或物）有矛盾看法的 ambivalence n． 矛盾心理.
商业托福词汇辅导资料09_外语教育网 ... ambivalence n. 矛盾心理 ambivalent adj. 有矛盾心理的 amble vi. 漫步，缓行.
英语词汇综合宝典 ... 112 ambiguous adj. 模棱两可的；分歧的 113 ambivalent adj. 矛盾的,好恶相克的 114 amble v. 缓行,溜蹄.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from ambivalence (from German Ambivalenz), on the pattern of equivalent

entry.tran: 摇摆不定的；犹豫不决的
entry.def: If you say that someone is ambivalent about something, they seem to be uncertain whether they really want it, or whether they really approve of it.

example.ex: She remained ambivalent about her marriage...
example.tran: 她对于自己的婚事仍然拿不定主意。

example.ex: He maintained an ambivalent attitude to the Church throughout his long life.
example.tran: 在他漫长的一生中，他对基督教信仰始终是一种摇摆不定的态度。

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by a mixture of opposite feelings or attitudes;
2. uncertain or unable to decide about what course to follow;

auth_sentence.content: Christianity...has always had an ambivalent attitude towards the family.
auth_sentence.res_content: Christianity...has always had an ambivalent attitude towards the family.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Christianity...has always had an ambivalent attitude towards the family.

auth_sentence.content: I felt ambivalent about it for a few more months.
auth_sentence.res_content: I felt ambivalent about it for a few more months.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I felt ambivalent about it for a few more months.

auth_sentence.content: This isn't to say that mug-shotists aren't ambivalent.
auth_sentence.res_content: This isn't to say that mug-shotists aren't ambivalent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This isn't to say that mug-shotists aren't ambivalent.

means.word_mean: 对某物、某人或某境况具有或显示矛盾情感的

sentences.en: I must have acquired ambivalent attitude towards women from her.
sentences.cn: 我对妇女的矛盾态度一定是从她那里学来的。
